reviews.review: 好玩啊，就是剧情有点渗人

Portal 2 is a puzzle game with portals. The gameplay is extremely fun and makes you think what to do so you can beat each chamber. This game has extremely nice humor and it always makes me laugh with the jokes. Its graphics are beautiful for a 2012 game, and your eyes aren't going to suffer with flashy lights. The level design has improved a lot when compared to Portal 1's level design, now you aren't going to get lost in a level most of the time. This game is astonishing and amazing. Would buy 3 times.
참된 게임성과 준수한 그래픽, 스토리가 플레이어를 즐겁게 해줬습니다. 후속작이 나오면 좋겠네요.

Very good game, if you liked portal, then you'll like this.

A game you can play at your own pace, with decent graphics on old hardware. AI humor is all over the place, so even if you're alone, well... You're not alone. Some rooms can hold you for half an hour, and community content keeps being produced to this day.

The modding community makes this gem even shinier. Hours and hours of challenges for single and coop if you dare to dive in. Overall 8/8, one of my favourite games.

Oyunu kuzenim bana önerdi ve al dedi oynarız, ilk başta mırın kırın yapıyordum. İndirime girdiğinde bir şans vereyim dedim zaten ucuz nasıl olsa diye, hayatımda verdiğim en iyi 3.70₺ olabilir gerçekten. Gerek oyun içerisinde olan komik diyaloglar, gerek oynarken birbirinize piçlik yapıp öldürebilmeniz çok eğlenceli ve iyi. Beraber oynayıp eğlenebileceğiniz bir duonuz varsa alın gitsin.
